compliant.section: Third party links and products on our Websites, NUVOTON’s App, and SERVICE may contain links to other third party websites that are not operated by NUVOTON, and our Websites, NUVOTON’s App and SERVICE may contain applications that you can download from third parties.
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject- (a) the source of the personal data, and, where appropriate; (b) the categories of personal data concerned

non_compliant.section: There is no activity in your account for a period of two years or more. (Including downloading files and updating account information.)
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data- storage limitation, Right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’)
non_compliant.amend: Data should only be stored as long as necessary for the specified purpose. Implement a data retention policy that includes criteria for erasure based on inactivity and provides individuals with the ability to manage their data or request erasure.

non_compliant.section: Your account information is not correct. (In case the information such as name, place of work and telephone number does not exist.)
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data- accuracy, Right to rectification
non_compliant.amend: Data controllers have an obligation to keep personal data accurate. Implement procedures for data subjects to update their information and rectify inaccuracies. Regularly review data for accuracy and implement mechanisms to address outdated information.
